TopicTitle: Do Not Taunt the Magic Boulder!

Articles.Content: Do not think about Magic Boulder.
Don't Scott Manley the Magic Boulder.

Do not send SSTV Signals to the Magic Boulder.

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/142653-we-are-probesspacecraft-send-sstv-signals/&do=embed"></iframe>
Do not plug games at the magic boulder
Do not let Deadpool get hold of magic boulder.
Do not allow your magic boulder near your cat, your dog, your 4 year old. Anything really.
Do not try to take the Magic Boulder's taxes or it's illegal orbiting fines. You will be given a poof of smoke and a dead kerbal.
Do not ask the Magic Boulder to do magic.
Dont ask the magic boulder why the mods you installed thru <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> arent working. Its just not a good time.
Don't irk the magic boulder.
Do not use the Magic Boulder if you have lymphatic heart disease and/or migraine. Ask your doctor if the Magic Boulder is the right treatment for you.

>

> 
> lymphatic heart disease
> 

wat.  

Do not apply the Magic Boulder directly to pets.

Lymphatic heart disease... I'm assuming that has something to do with the lymph nodes near the heart.

Do not assume the Magic Boulder is now a random texture applied to asteroids.

\*dies of "teleportation to black hole"\*
Do *not*, under **any** circumstances, bait the magic boulder with pies.
Do not, EVER, pressure the Magic Boulder into a Genocide Route, make fun of it's walrus mustache, or let it come into contact with quantum foam.
Do not use pieces of the magic boulder to make spacetime control devices, because that would infringe on my patents.
Do not patent devices which contain Magic Boulder material.
Do not use devices which include the Magic Boulder.
Do not Klaw the Magic Boulder.
Do not mention the Magic Boulder in forum games. Do not make paradoxical statements about the Magic Boulder. All statements regarding the Magic Boulder must be paradoxical in nature.

do not taunt the magic boulder you're gonna end hacking into everyone brain directly without asking for it, and you will watch all thoose people hacking computer not even understanding why they do such silly thing ; )
Do not...oh, screw it! PLEASE, go ahead and ship Dres with the Magic Boulder!

Magic Boulder contains a proprietary firmware which, per FCC regulations, may not be examined, altered, removed, or replaced by the end user. Alternative or modified firmware may not be fully compatible with your Magic Boulder, which could result in loss of function, electrical damage, unmoderated reality excursions, or invalidation of your Magic Boulder's manufacturer's warranty. To report illegally modified Magic Boulder instances, please contact Thaumatic Minerals LTD or your local FCC office immediately.

Magic Boulder may affect the inductance and capacitance of electrical parts in close proximity to it. Remember to check the functionality of flyback diodes, fuses, filters, and other safety features of all electronic machinery which spends more than two hours per day within your Magic Boulder's 500-meter area of effect, and be aware that some equipment may require adjustment before it will be operable within this area.

Magic Boulder's surface exhibits a strong negative electric potential when lit, and a positive potential when shaded. While this is an important driving aspect behind many of Magic Boulder's exciting and useful functions, it can pose a significant hazard when Magic Boulder comes into contact with conductive materials. Keep Magic Boulder evenly illuminated at 201.47 lux at all times when not in use, avoid allowing shadows to pass across its surface, and never use flashlights, headlamps, or other mobile illumination sources around Magic Boulder's containment apparatus. When local illumination is necessary, use only Thaumatic Minerals LTD Magic Boulder Safelights.

It worked! I am free! I can post here on mobile again! MUEHEHEHEHE!

Do not expose Magic Boulder to raw or undercooked meat or fish.
Do not let Magic Boulder in contact with specimens of *psychrolutes marcidus* with a degree in experimental politics.
